image¶

class image.CustomImage(path, folder='reduced')[source]¶

Bases: object

The CustomImage class implements the image reduction size and quality operation..

Attributes:

image (Image): The image object from PIL.

width (int): The width of the image.

height (int): The height of the image.

path (str): The path of the image.

reduced_path (str): The path of the reduced image.

reduce_image(size=0.5, quality=75)[source]¶

Set the size and the quality of the image.

Parameters

  • size (float) – The reduction size coefficient.

  • quality (int) – The percentage of quality.

Returns

True if the path of the reduced image exists else False.

Return type

bool
